page.title: 06The Fitness Trail
page.content: Along by the riverside of Wick is a fifteen obstacle fitness trail donated by the Trustees Savings Bank. A lot of the obstacles are easy, but a few are quite difficult, so instruction boards have been put up for fitness freaks who don't know what to do. The trail has proved popular in Wick, being used by groups such as Scouts and fitness clubs, or just the odd passer by with nothing to do. It is built for everyone. If one is not feeling fit enough for monkey bars, one could maybe try something of an easier taste such as stepping through tyres. The trail has also been armed with benches for the exhausted athlete or the person who loves to sit and watch other people being energetic. The Wick fitness trail is very much appreciated by all age groups.
